item.title: Sharon C. gave 5 stars to: Vitamin C Serum for Face ★ BEST Anti-Aging Serum Infused With Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin E + Amino Complex - Professional Grade Advanced Formula - For Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Age Spots and Skin Discoloration - Natural & Organic Ingredients - Preferred over Moisturizers & Lotions - For Youthful Beauty Look No Further - Our Customers Rave About Their Results - Recommended for a Reason - Your Results Backed by AMAZING Guarantee
item.description:
Sharon C. reviewed:

Vitamin C Serum for Face ★ BEST Anti-Aging Serum Infused With Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin E + Amino Complex - Professional Grade Advanced Formula - For Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Age Spots and Skin Discoloration - Natural & Organic Ingredients - Preferred over Moisturizers & Lotions - For Youthful Beauty Look No Further - Our Customers Rave About Their Results - Recommended for a Reason - Your Results Backed by AMAZING Guarantee by Foxbrim
I love that Foxbrim uses organic ingredients, February 4, 2015
Verified Purchase(What's this?)
This review is from: Vitamin C Serum for Face ★ BEST Anti-Aging Serum Infused With Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin E + Amino Complex - Professional Grade Advanced Formula - For Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Age Spots and Skin Discoloration - Natural & Organic Ingredients - Preferred over Moisturizers & Lotions - For Youthful Beauty Look No Further - Our Customers Rave About Their Results - Recommended for a Reason - Your Results Backed by AMAZING Guarantee (Misc.)
I know this product is designed for face and neck use, but I'm using it more to focus on improving my skin texture and appearance on the back of my hands. If there is one place on my body that shows more age than any other, including my face, it is my hands. So what do I think? Well, I'm loving it so far. My hands no longer have a dried, cracked look but instead my skin is noticeably softer and more pliable. I'm also seeing a lightening of my age spots that have come out of nowhere in the last few years. Granted it is winter, but I can't remember ever thinking in past winters that these age spots are going away. I love that Foxbrim uses organic ingredients. Since our skin is like a sponge when it comes to absorption, I am comforted in knowing that I'm not rubbing chemicals into my body. Thank you for a quality product.
